tools.name: cleanSignal
tools.description: Removes periodic noise from a signal using a Butterworth notch filter centered at the given frequency. Useful for cleaning signals contaminated with power line interference.

noisy.description: The noisy input signal as a file:// URL.

frequency.description: The frequency or period of the noise to remove.

clean.description: The filtered signal after removing the periodic noise, as a file:// URI.

status.description: Status of the operation: true for success, false for failure

msg.description: Message describing error if operation failed.
